resources.string:
"Power Off" requires the use of allowed AccessibilityServices, can detect touching the application icon "Power Off" on the phone screen to bring up a list of options of the power physical key of equipment.

+ Apart from the aforementioned feature "Power Off" does not have the right to use the network, nor access, nor collect any other features and information.

+ Purpose of using the application "Power Off": can replace the hard physical power key on the device to increase the life of the key.

Please enable "Auto-start" permission so the app doesn't automatically invalidate.

Note: "Power off" uses the Accessibility service !

+ Android Accessibility Service is intended primarily for disabled users to perform standard phone operations easily. For example, the built-in TalkBack feature can be used to read screen content aloud. All you have to do is touch the screen.

+ "Power Off" requires the use of allowed AccessibilityServices, can detect touching the application icon "Power Off" on the phone screen to bring up a list of options of the power physical key of equipment.

+ Apart from the aforementioned feature "Power Off" does not have the right to use the network, nor access, nor collect any other features and information.

+ Purpose of using the application "Power Off": can replace the hard physical power key on the device to increase the life of the key.

+ You do not accept the terms, use the accessibility service for the application can be uninstalled at any time.
